MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline, affecting customers on Arthur Street. Engineers are carrying out repair work on our underground network on Arthur Street and we still expect all power to be restored by 10.30pm. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.26pm on the 22nd November 2020.
